Issue.creator: sergey.khoroshavin
Issue.summary: Move log compression into separate process
Issue.description: Currently log compression during rotation is performed in same process as request processing which can lead to 2-second pauses in processing during rotation (for 100 Mb log size threshold). Also if we switch to xz compression (which provides another 5-10 fold compression over currently used gzip) these pauses will be increased to 15-20 seconds. Moving compression into other process will eliminate these problems.
